cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I am round and I go around the Sun. You live on me! What am I?
I am a light you see at night. I'm very far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🔭 You need a telescope to see me better.
🌌 I am part of a big group with the Sun.

cosmos.question: I change shape every night. Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am full and bright.

cosmos.question: I am red and dusty, and people might visit me someday. What planet am I?

hints.text: 🚀 We send rovers to explore me.
🍫 I am named after a Roman god of war.
🔴 I am called the Red Planet.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that makes a picture. What am I called?

hints.text: ursa 🐻 Major is a famous one.
✨ I help you find your way.
🌌 I have a name like a bear or hunter.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas, the biggest planet in our solar system. Who am I?

hints.text: 🟠 I have a big red spot.
💨 I am made of mostly hydrogen and helium.

cosmos.question: I am a icy object that sometimes has a tail when I get close to the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ My tail always points away from the Sun.
🧊 I'm made of ice, dust and rock.
✨ Some people think I bring bad luck!

cosmos.question: I'm a group of many stars, gas, and dust, held together by gravity. Our Sun lives in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 My name sounds like something you drink from cows.

cosmos.question: I am a long journey through space, often to visit another planet or star. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 You need a special ship for me.
🌌 It can take a long, long time to finish me!

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Bunnies love to eat me! What am I?
I have a stem, leaves, and bright colors. People give me as a gift. What am I?
I am big and tall and have many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.
🍁 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I'm long and green and grow on a vine. You can slice me up for a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am related to a pumpkin.
🥪 You can put me on a sandwich.

plant.question: I have seeds inside and grow on a plant. I can be red, yellow, or green. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I am a popular pizza topping.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows tall and makes a yummy yellow treat at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I make a loud popping sound.
🎬 You eat me at the cinema.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem and beautiful flowers. Be careful, I have thorns! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 People give me as a sign of love.
🌸 I come in many different colors.

plant.question: I am a seed that needs water and sun to grow. I can make a plant. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I can become a big plant or tree.

plant.question: I am a type of grass that you can eat. Farmers grow lots of me to make bread and pasta. What am I?

hints.text: 🍝 I am used to make noodles.

plant.question: I'm a very tall tree with needles instead of leaves. Many people decorate me for Christmas. What am I?
